name: Tilt: Quill's Quandary
description:
"An adorable, challenging puzzler that’ll have you engrossed for a long time." - Cult of Mac
"Fun and engaging. It is challenging stuff." - 148Apps
"How can anyone resist a cute pirate hedgehog, anyway?" - App Advice

Suggestions, bugs, love letters? I read all of it! Send it on over to noah@tiltthegame.com

Say "Ahoy!" to your new best mate! The intrepid Captain Quill has lost his hat and it'll take all the mettle you can muster to recover it.

FEATURES
• 100 of our cleverest hand-crafted puzzles.
• No IAP required. Test your wits, not your wallet.
• Intuitive accelerometer-based controls
• Adorable illustrations
• iCloud synching for multiple devices

iPhone 4/iPad 2 supported. iPhone 5/iPad 3 or newer recommended.
